description:
When Kitahara Iori heads off to college, he decides to live at his uncle`s dive shop in Izu. Iori is looking forward to experiencing college life, but ends up running into a group of tough guys playing strip rock-paper-scissors. Iori gets dragged into the diving club`s crazy shenanigans and ends up spending his first day in college wearing nothing but a pair of underwear.
Source: Amazon
